post.title: Get Your Holiday Concert Tix!
post.description:

post.content:
Hello Band Families,

Just a reminder to order your Holiday Concert Tickets today! Seats are filling up fast, so please turn in your completed order forms to the White Band Box ASAP. Tickets will be sent home with your Bando when your order is completed. Remember, even if you are entitled to free tickets with your Booster membership, you must still fill out an order form so that we will know which concert you are attending and how many seats you will need. Any questions, please call Janet Frantz at (440) 877-1627.

Download 2016 Holiday Concert Ticket Order Form
